# VZSocketDeviceConfiguration

**Class**

The common configuration traits for socket device requests.

## Declaration

```swift
class VZSocketDeviceConfiguration
```

## Overview

Don’t create a [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZSocketDeviceConfiguration] object directly. Instead, create a [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtioSocketDeviceConfiguration] object and add it to your virtual machine’s configuration.

## Configurations

- **VZVirtioSocketDeviceConfiguration**: A configuration object that requests the creation of a socket device to communicate with the guest system.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Inherited By

- VZVirtioSocketDeviceConfiguration

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
